doc.description:
Inter-MCU communication over SPI
To enable this, please set the "SEPARATE_FBW" configure option to TRUE in your airframe file for both AP and FBW targets

configure.name: SEPARATE_FBW
configure.description: Enable separation between AP and FBW on separated MCU

configure.name: INTER_MCU_SPI
configure.description: SPI used for inter mcu communication

makefile.raw: ifeq (,$(findstring $(SEPARATE_FBW),1 TRUE)) $(error Using intermcu via SPI, so dual mcu with separate fbw. Please set option "SEPARATE_FBW" to TRUE. endif
